```{=html}
<style>
.category-row {
  margin-bottom: 3rem;
  padding-bottom: 2rem;
}

.category-title {
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: #3a506b;
  padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
  border-bottom: 2px solid #5bc0be;
}

.day-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(6, 1fr);
  grid-gap: 1.2rem;
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.day-thumbnail {
  position: relative;
  aspect-ratio: 1;
  border-radius: 8px;
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  transition: transform 0.3s;
  text-decoration: none;
  display: block;
}

.day-thumbnail:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.day-thumbnail img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: cover;
  object-position: center;
}

.day-number {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
  color: white;
  padding: 0.25rem 0.5rem;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  border-bottom-right-radius: 8px;
  z-index: 2;
}

.day-title {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
  color: white;
  padding: 0.25rem 0.5rem;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  text-align: center;
  z-index: 2;
}

.empty-thumbnail {
  background-color: #f0f0f0;
  border: 1px dashed #ccc;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  opacity: 0.7;
}

.empty-thumbnail .day-number {
  position: static;
  background-color: transparent;
  color: #666;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.empty-thumbnail .day-title {
  position: static;
  background-color: transparent;
  color: #666;
}

@media (max-width: 992px) {
  .day-grid {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .day-grid {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
  }
}

@media (max-width: 576px) {
  .day-grid {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  }
}

.footer-content {
  margin-top: 3rem;
  padding-top: 1rem;
  border-top: 1px solid #eee;
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: #666;
}
</style>
```
